description: Triangle T(n,k), 1 <= k <= n, giving maximal size of binary code of length n and covering radius k.
comments: Next term, T(9,1), is in range 55-62.
references: G. D. Cohen et al., Covering Codes, North-Holland, 1997, p. 166.
links: W. Haas, Binary and ternary codes of covering radius one: some new lower bounds, Discrete Math., 245 (2002), 161-178.
Index entries for sequences related to covering codes
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 07 2001
